description: This file defines the CloudFormationStack class, which manages AWS CloudFormation stacks, including creation, reading, deletion, and resource retrieval, using boto3 and custom AWS client wrappers.

classes.name: CloudFormationStack
classes.description: A class representing an AWS CloudFormation stack, providing methods to create, read, delete, and manage stack resources.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates a CloudFormation stack using the provided AWS client.

methods.name: post_create
methods.description: Waits for the stack creation to complete if configured to do so.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads the current state of the stack from AWS.

methods.name: post_delete
methods.description: Waits for the stack deletion to complete if configured to do so.

methods.name: get_stack_resource
methods.description: Retrieves a specific resource within the stack by logical ID.

methods.name: get_stack_resource_physical_id
methods.description: Gets the physical resource ID of a stack resource.

methods.name: get_private_subnets
methods.description: Retrieves the physical IDs of private subnet resources within the stack.

methods.name: get_public_subnets
methods.description: Retrieves the physical IDs of public subnet resources within the stack.

methods.name: get_security_group
methods.description: Retrieves the security group ID associated with the stack.
